channel.title: Apple on Floyd Hightower
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on Floyd Hightower

item.title: Fake Apple App Download Sites
item.description: Note: All URLs/domains in this post are defanged. You can fang/defang them here. I was investigating how to use x11 to serve a GUI running inside a docker container for an nand2tetris project I’m working on and I found a collection of domains serving fake Apple app downloads: hXXps://loadsea[.]heredoggi[.]com/x11-forwarding-for-mac/ hXXps://moraea[.]batteryscience[.]us/location-of-x11-libraries-mac-os/ hXXps://letdwnl[.]brittanythomassigler[.]us/mac-os-x11-app/ hXXps://gogo[.]sunshinebeagles[.]us/mac-x11-manual-pdf-5252/ hXXps://isabelmaries[.]co/xquartz-alternative/ hXXps://holidayshunter[.]naturalwatches[.]co/x11-forwarding-for-mac/ Most of these redirect to a URL like: hXXps://viperctum[.]info/go[.]php?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn[.]ketamo[.]info%2F%3Fa%3D337 89%26c%3D303745%26s1%3D111%26s2%3D1411c3vzwslb4a16%26s3%3DX11%2BForwarding%2BFor%2BM ac&uclick=3vzwslb4 Which, decoded, looks like: hXXps://viperctum[.]info/go[.]php?url=hXXps://cdn[.]ketamo[.]info/?a=33789&c=303745 &s1=111&s2=1411c3vzwslb4a16&s3=X11+Forwarding+For+Mac&uclick=3vzwslb4 When followed, this link goes to:
